title: Bolt.new — AI Tool Review
description: Bolt.new is StackBlitz's AI-powered web app builder that creates, runs, edits, and deploys full-stack applications directly in the browser. Bolt.new is an AI-powered development environment by StackBlitz that lets you build full-stack web applications entirely in the browser. Powered by Claude, it can install packages, run servers, debug errors, and deploy apps — all without any local setup. It's one of the fastest ways to go from idea to deployed app, making it hugely popular for vibe coding and rapid prototyping. Highlights: In-browser development — no setup. Full-stack: frontend + backend + DB. Instant preview and deployment. Package installation support. Claude-powered AI.
